title: Câmara (Antonio Rodrigues da)
body: Born in Madeira and was the natural son of Rui Gonçalves da Câmara. He accompanied his father to São Miguel when he bought the captaincy of that island. He distinguished himself in Africa, and Antonio Cordeiro says, in the Insulana History, that he was a great knight, citing a case that was widely known at the time it occurred.
